If these things formed the conversation of believers today, it would greatly confirm their faith and add to their spiritual growth in a knowledge of God and His ways. Satan is pleased to have the mind dwell upon matters of no consequence, to have the conversation dwell upon trifling things, while these wonderful memorials of God, the manifestations of His power, sink out of sight. This is the reason why so many have lost their first love.-- Letter 33, 1890, pp. 1-5. (To Brothers and Sisters in_____, December 4, 1890.) 

White Estate Washington, D. C. March 19, 1979
